channel.title: Home on Shubham Apat
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Shubham Apat

item.title: Collecting 1,400 University Degrees: A Global Dataset
item.description: How I scraped 1,400 unique university degrees from 8 countries to build a comprehensive academic verification dataset

item.title: LinkedIn Scraper - Comprehensive Social Media Data Extraction
item.description: Advanced LinkedIn scraper that extracts posts, profiles, and jobs without login requirements, with built-in Google reCAPTCHA bypass capability.

item.title: Image Moderation using OpenAI CLIP
item.description: Implemented image moderation pipeline using OpenAI's CLIP model achieving 92% accuracy through prompt engineering and hyperparameter tuning.

item.title: Building a 150K+ Image Dataset for Content Moderation
item.description: How I collected and curated 150,000+ images across 6 classes for training robust content moderation models

item.title: Optimizing NSFW Content Moderation: From 250ms to 180ms
item.description: How I optimized NSFW detection inference time by 28% using OpenVINO, beating Ultralytics' own benchmarks

item.title: Event Verifier: Detecting Fake Event Listings with Fuzzy Matching
item.description: Building a generalized crawler to verify event credibility across platforms using fuzzy keyword matching

item.title: Scraping 70K Property Listings: PG & Hostel Data Collection
item.description: How I collected 70,000+ PG and Hostel listings from Magic Bricks, JustDial, and 99acres for college students

item.title: Student ID Verification Pipeline for dip
item.description: Comprehensive ID verification pipeline using YOLOv8, UNet, and DenseNet121 for detecting forged ID cards with multiple validation layers.

item.title: College Hotspots Dashboard - Interactive Data Visualization
item.description: Built a comprehensive interactive dashboard from scratch using Dash by Plotly, analyzing 3GB of business data around colleges across major Indian cities.

item.title: Individual Identification of Mugger Crocodiles using YOLOv8
item.description: Deep learning research for wildlife conservation - 98.5% accuracy in identifying 160+ individual crocodiles

item.title: Individual Identification of Mugger Crocodiles using YOLOv8
item.description:
Built a YOLOv8-based model to identify 160+ individual free-ranging crocodiles from UAV imagery with 98.5% accuracy.
Optimized training on Param Shavak supercomputer using custom CLI scripts for data processing.

item.title: BookMyShow Scraper - High-Performance Web Scraping
item.description: Developed a highly optimized scraper for BookMyShow that can extract events from all 1,898 cities across India with 60x performance optimization.

item.title: Cleaning 20,000+ Confessions: Building a Content Moderation Dataset
item.description: My first task at ByteCitadel - cleaning and labeling 20K+ text confessions for dip: life beyond colleges app

item.title: Remote Sensing-Based Mangrove Classification
item.description: Developed a mangrove classification model for India using Sentinel-2A multispectral imagery and Random Forest classifier with 99.03% accuracy.

item.title: Real-Time Self-Driving Car with Lane Detection
item.description: Built a Raspberry Pi-based self-driving car capable of lane detection, obstacle avoidance, and path navigation using real-time image processing.
